CREATE TABLE sqlite_sequence(name,seq);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "cards"
(
    id                      INTEGER           not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    artist                  TEXT,
    asciiName               TEXT,
    availability            TEXT,
    borderColor             TEXT,
    cardKingdomFoilId       TEXT,
    cardKingdomId           TEXT,
    colorIdentity           TEXT,

    convertedManaCost       REAL,

    edhrecRank              INTEGER,
    faceConvertedManaCost   REAL,
    faceName                TEXT,
    flavorName              TEXT,
    flavorText              TEXT,
    frameEffects            TEXT,
    frameVersion            TEXT,
    hand                    TEXT,
    hasAlternativeDeckLimit INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasContentWarning       INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasFoil                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    hasNonFoil              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isAlternative           INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isFullArt               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOnlineOnly            INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isOversized             INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isPromo                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isReprint               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isReserved              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isStarter               INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isStorySpotlight        INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isTextless              INTEGER default 0 not null,
    isTimeshifted           INTEGER default 0 not null,
    keywords                TEXT,
    layout                  TEXT,
    leadershipSkills        TEXT,
    life                    TEXT,
    loyalty                 TEXT,
    manaCost                TEXT,
    mcmId                   TEXT,
    mcmMetaId               TEXT,
    mtgArenaId              TEXT,
    mtgjsonV4Id             TEXT,
    mtgoFoilId              TEXT,
    mtgoId                  TEXT,
    multiverseId            TEXT,
    name                    TEXT,
    number                  TEXT,
    originalReleaseDate     TEXT,
    originalText            TEXT,
    originalType            TEXT,
    otherFaceIds            TEXT,
    power                   TEXT,
    printings               TEXT,
    promoTypes              TEXT,
    purchaseUrls            TEXT,
    rarity                  TEXT,
    scryfallId              TEXT,
    scryfallIllustrationId  TEXT,
    scryfallOracleId        TEXT,
    setCode                 TEXT,
    side                    TEXT,
    subtypes                TEXT,
    supertypes              TEXT,
    tcgplayerProductId      TEXT,
    text                    TEXT,
    toughness               TEXT,
    type                    TEXT,
    types                   TEXT,
    uuid                    TEXT              not null
        unique,
    variations              TEXT,
    watermark               TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "foreign_data"
(
    id           INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    flavorText   TEXT,
    language     TEXT,
    multiverseid INTEGER,
    name         TEXT,
    text         TEXT,
    type         TEXT,
    uuid         TEXT
        references cards (uuid)
);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "legalities"
(
    id     INTEGER not null
        primary key autoincrement,
    format TEXT,
    status TEXT,

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT language, COUNT(*) FROM foreign_data WHERE language LIKE '%Chinese%' GROUP BY language;"
input.description: Check Chinese language variants in foreign_data

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_cards FROM cards;"

sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "
SELECT 
  COUNT(CASE WHEN c.isOnlineOnly = 1 THEN 1 END) as online_only_count,
  COUNT(*) as total_count,
  CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN c.isOnlineOnly = 1 THEN 1 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(*) * 100 as percentage
FROM foreign_data fd
JOIN cards c ON fd.uuid = c.uuid
WHERE fd.language = 'Chinese Simplified';
"
input.description: Calculate percentage of Chinese Simplified cards that are online-only

content.thinking:
Hmm, so there are 0 Chinese Simplified cards that are online-only. Let me re-read the claim more carefully.

The claim says: "Fewer than one-tenth of one percent of the cards meet both conditions—Chinese Simplified language and online-only availability—at about 0.0826%."

This could mean: of ALL cards, what percentage are both Chinese Simplified and online-only? Let me think about this differently. The hint says: percentage = DIVIDE(COUNT(isOnlineOnly = 1),COUNT(isOnlineOnly))*100

Wait, but foreign_data has language info. So the question might be about the percentage of cards in the foreign_data table with Chinese Simplified language that are also online-only. But I got 0 for that.
 
Maybe I need to approach this differently—perhaps the claim is asking what percentage of all cards have both a Chinese Simplified entry in foreign_data AND are marked as online-only. Let me check if there are actually any online-only cards with Chinese Simplified translations at all.

input.command:
sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "
-- Check: out of all cards, how many are both in Chinese Simplified AND online-only
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) 
FROM cards c 
JOIN foreign_data fd ON c.uuid = fd.uuid 
WHERE fd.language = 'Chinese Simplified' AND c.isOnlineOnly = 1;
"

sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "
-- Alternative interpretation: percentage among all foreign_data rows
SELECT 
  COUNT(CASE WHEN fd.language = 'Chinese Simplified' AND c.isOnlineOnly = 1 THEN 1 END) as both_conditions,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  CAST(COUNT(CASE WHEN fd.language = 'Chinese Simplified' AND c.isOnlineOnly = 1 THEN 1 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(*) * 100 as pct
FROM foreign_data fd
JOIN cards c ON fd.uuid = c.uuid;
"
input.description: Check percentage among all foreign_data rows

input.command:
sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "
-- Check the hint interpretation: among Chinese Simplified cards, percentage that are online-only
-- Using the hint formula: DIVIDE(COUNT(isOnlineOnly = 1), COUNT(isOnlineOnly)) * 100
SELECT 
  SUM(CASE WHEN c.isOnlineOnly = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as online_only,
  COUNT(c.isOnlineOnly) as total,
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN c.isOnlineOnly = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) / COUNT(c.isOnlineOnly) * 100 as pct
FROM foreign_data fd
JOIN cards c ON fd.uuid = c.uuid
WHERE fd.language = 'Chinese Simplified';
"
input.description: Apply hint formula for Chinese Simplified cards

input.command:
sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/card_games.sqlite" "
-- Check if any online-only cards have any foreign_data at all
SELECT fd.language, COUNT(*) 
FROM cards c 
JOIN foreign_data fd ON c.uuid = fd.uuid 
WHERE c.isOnlineOnly = 1 
GROUP BY fd.language;
"

The claim is CONTRADICTED because there are zero cards meeting both conditions, not 0.0826%.
